content: this item is a digital pdf crochet pattern you will not receive the finished toy like in the photos this is a crochet pattern written in english only and uses standard us terms you will receive a 5-page pdf refunds are not available on this item difficulty beginner skills required crocheting in a spiral magic_ring single_crochet bobble stitch increasing decreasing and chaining supplies required + chunky chenille yarn i used toucan by hobbii yarns in pink + 12mm safety eyes + 4 5mm crochet hook + scissors + darning needle + stitch marker * polyester fiberfill for stuffing this pattern is workable in any yarn type so long as you change your hook size and safety eye size to make odin really tiny use 10mm eyes medium weight chenille or velvet yarn and a 3 25mm crochet hook i used bernat baby velvet in bleached aqua this pattern will be available for immediate download copyright © 2024 johannamigurumi contents of this document may not be copied altered reproduced published or distributed in any way all photographs included in this listing and pdf are property of johannamigurumi and may not be used without written consent you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to johannamigurumi happy crocheting i would love to see your finished item please tag @johannamigurumi on instagram
